title: Bug 10022 - Incorrect 'Build' Popup Action Enablement
description: This bug report pertains to the behavior of the 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu within the Java perspective.
OB: The observed behavior mentioned is that the 'Build' action in the popup menu is always enabled, even if the user has selected 'Perform build automatically on resource modification' in Preferences > Workbench.
EB: The expected behavior should be that the 'Build' action is disabled when 'Perform build automatically on resource modification' is selected in Preferences > Workbench.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Go to the Java perspective.
2. Open the popup menu.
3. Observe that the 'Build' action is enabled even if 'Perform build automatically on resource modification' is selected in Preferences > Workbench.
